timeline.bodyText: We reach this point even for !(isPureAscii(charAtIfromOne) && !(isPureAscii(charAtIfromTwo)) right? We shouldn't be doing equalsIgnoreCase in that case?

replies.bodyText:
Can't we simplify this logic by handling the flow in the following order?

if both are pure ASCII, return equalsIgnoreCase
else return equals
